title: Club Bug
body: Im the owner of the club and i cant see the club but all other members can see it i know im not the only one facing this i have seen many other complain about this . I sent a ticket 2 days ago to support idk when they will reply.I just wanna know if club division is aware of this issue or not? I have not seen  those examination mark they put when they are working on fixing a bug

replies.body: well it has been 3 days since i sent the ticket and have yet to get reply i wonder how long is it gonna take{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

This seems to be an issue floating around since the clubs re-enable. We're taking a look into this via support tickets, which you've already submitted. I recommend sitting tight until one of our specialists can reach back out to you in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
